body.p: The type of numbering is controlled by the parameter args.css.param.numbering.
This parameter activates different sets of CSS rules from the built-in CSS. By default, only the first-level topics (the chapters) are numbered (shallow numbering). The following values are accepted:

row.entry: counted from the start of publication
